lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. has slapped a three-game suspension on Danny Briere for this incident from the end of the Flyers-Islanders game from Saturday night....
snippet: Danny Briere's stick whack to the head of the Islanders' Frans Nielsen earned him a mere three-game suspension.

headline.main: The Morning Skate: A Missed Opportunity, a Capital Revival, a Flameout in Calgary

abstract: Danny Briere's stick whack to the head of the Islanders' Frans Nielsen earned him a mere three-game suspension.
